entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
